location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Howell Beynon, Jeypore [Jaipur] to Colonel Sir Lewis Pelly, on leave in England

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Pelly for the kindness he has shown to his wife Charlotte Beynon; announcing his departure from Rajpootana [Rajasthan] and giving reactions from friends and colleagues to the news; and discussing the recent visit of the Viceroy (Edward Bulwer-Lytton, 2nd Baron Lytton) and the Prince (Edward Albert, Prince of Wales, later Edward VII) to Rajpootana [Rājasthān]
